onboarding.welcomeDm: 👋 Welcome to TVO-helper-Bot! Click below to begin onboarding.
onboarding.ackGuild: I have sent you a DM to get started!
onboarding.vowsPrompt: 📜 Please read and consent to our VOWs to continue.
onboarding.bioPrompt: 📝 Write a short bio about yourself (50–200 chars):
onboarding.gamingExperiencePrompt: 🎮 How many years of gaming experience do you have?
onboarding.farmsPrompt: 🚜 Do you run any farms? Choose one:
onboarding.alertPrompt: 🔔 Would you like to receive {type} alerts?
onboarding.timezonePrompt: 🌍 Select your current time zone from the list below:
onboarding.selectExperience: 🎮 How many years of gaming experience do you have?
onboarding.selectFarms: 🌾 How many farms do you run?
onboarding.formTitle: 🚨 Reap the Benefits—Join Our Alerts System!
onboarding.benefits:
• Receive timely alerts direct to your inbox
• Never miss an event; always be ready to defend
• Better engagement and game awareness
onboarding.confirmProceed: ✅ Your alert preferences have been saved!
onboarding.ruinsTitle: ⛩️ Select Your Preferred Alliance Ruins Time
onboarding.ruinsDesc: Pick the Alliance Ruins time you’d like to participate in:
onboarding.ruinsNone: None of these times suit me

vows.title: 🗜 VOWS OF THE ORDER – OUR SHARED OATH
vows.subtitle: “When you raise our banner, you take our vow — to uphold the spirit and strength of The Vigilant Order.”

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: We value every player, every background. Disrespect is weakness. We rise by lifting others.

growth.title: Growth
growth.desc: From the smallest castle to the most seasoned warrior, we grow together — but only with those hungry for it.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.desc: Active minds, active battles. Communication is our strongest weapon.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.desc: No lone wolves. True strength is forged in unity, not ego.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.desc: Show up. Be present. Take part. The Order isn’t a tag — it’s a responsibility.

vows.confirmed: ✅ You have agreed to the VOWs of The Order!
vows.declined: ❌ You must agree to the VOWs to continue.

coc.title: ⚖ CODE OF CONDUCT – THE ORDER’S EXPECTATIONS
coc.subtitle: We are disciplined. We are prepared. We play with pride.

respect.title: Respect is Mandatory
respect.desc: Global alliance. Diverse voices. Zero tolerance for hate, harassment or politics.

discipline.title: Troop Discipline
discipline.desc: Stay under hospital cap unless shielded….

engagement.title: Engagement Required
engagement.desc: Read posts. Join discussions. Use Discord to strengthen the Order.

defend.title: Defend One Another
defend.desc: If we’re scouted or at war — we defend. Always.

donate.title: Donate Daily
donate.desc: 3 x 15 donations per day (45 total). No excuses.

events.title: Show Up to Events
events.desc: Elite Wars, Adventures, TD, Realm events. Show up or show you’re not part of this Order.

coc.confirmed: ✅ You have agreed to the Code of Conduct!
coc.declined: ❌ You must agree to the Code of Conduct to continue.

elite.title: ⚔️ Elite Adventures
elite.desc: Occurs every week on Sunday at 20:00.

defence.title: 🛡️ Territory Defence
defence.desc: Occurs every fortnight on Saturday at 20:00.

onboarding.onboarding.bioPrompt: Please fill in the form below to share a little about yourself.
onboarding.onboarding.bioConfirm: Thank you! We've saved your bio.
onboarding.onboarding.selectFarms: How many farms do you run?

errors.noResponse: ⌛ No response received. Please run `/onboarding` again when you are ready.
errors.generic: ❌ An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

alerts.subscribeConfirm: ✅ Subscribed to **{type}** alerts and role assigned.
alerts.unsubscribeConfirm: ✅ Unsubscribed from **{type}** alerts and role removed.

profile.commandDesc: View or update your user profile
profile.noProfile: You do not have a profile yet. Run /onboarding first.
profile.invalidCommand: Invalid command. Use /profile view or /profile update.
profile.updateExperienceDesc: Update your years of gaming experience

announceDescription: Please welcome {user} who just completed onboarding!

cbsp.joinCheckDm: Check your DMs to complete CBSP onboarding.
cbsp.enterCastle: Please enter your castle name and coordinates (e.g., Gav.01 455:502)
cbsp.joinAnnounce: 📦 **{username}** has registered their CBSP castle: **{castleName}** at **{coords}**
cbsp.cleanRequestDm: Your cleaning request has been noted.
cbsp.cleanPost:
🚜 **{username}** has CBSP castle at **{coords}** ready for cleaning!
🕒 Requested on {timestamp}
cbsp.cleanConfirm: 🎉 Thank you to **{username}**—Resources are now in the depot! 💪🌾
cbsp.pushPromptAmount: 💰 How many resources do you need?
cbsp.pushPost:
🛘 **{username}** requests CBSP support for **{building}**, amount needed: **{amount}**
🟡 Status: Awaiting approval
cbsp.pushAnnounceDm: ✅ Your CBSP push request is submitted!
cbsp.pushActiveDm: ✅ Your CBSP push is now active! Please collect your support from the depot to upgrade {building}.
cbsp.pushComplete: 🏆 Congratulations to **{username}**—Another proven success of the Central Build Support Program!
cbsp.intro: Central Build Support Program! 🌾🍄—designed to fuel upgrades, empower players, and drive our alliance to new heights!
cbsp.howItWorks:
📜 How It Works:

➡ Players submit a push request to request build support.
➡ No farm = No support access.
cbsp.whyJoin:
🚀 Why Join?

Share the burden and upgrade faster than ever.

Enjoy organized, fair resource distributions!
cbsp.joinThanks: ✅ You're now part of the CBSP! Check Discord for cleaning, pushes, and updates. Welcome aboard!
cbsp.gettingStarted:
🗒 How to Get Started:

1⃣ Submit join request via `/cbsp join`.
2⃣ Await DM confirmation.
3⃣ Use `/cbsp clean` or `/cbsp push` to request help.
4⃣ Start gathering daily for victory 🏆

leaderboard.description: Show the top players by points
leaderboard.commandDesc: Show the top players by points
leaderboard.optionCountDesc: How many top entries to show
leaderboard.title: 🏆 Leaderboard: Top {count}

shield.commandDesc: Share your active shield status and subscribe for expiry alerts
shield.logFollowUp: Follow-up message sent after shield error
shield.errorExecute: ❌ Something went wrong trying to start your shield setup.

cmd.description: Share your active shield status and subscribe for expiry alerts

flow.promptStartTime:
🕒 When should your shield start? Default is current time.
Or enter a time like `18:00` or `2025-05-12T14:00`.
flow.confirmDmStart: ✅ Your shield DM flow has started!
flow.errorStart: ❌ Could not start shield sharing. Please try again later.
flow.errorTimeout: ⌛ You took too long. please run `/shield` again.
flow.warnInvalidTime: ⚠ I couldn't parse that time, I'll use now as your start time.
flow.confirmShared: ✅ Your shield has been shared in #shield-info!

shield.subscribedConfirmation: 🔔 You're now subscribed. You'll get a DM 15 minutes before your shield at {location} ends.
shield.bumpEndingSoon: 🔔 <@{player}>, your shield at **{location}** ends in less than 30 minutes!

embed.footer: React with 👀 to get a 15-minute warning before it ends!
